property.name: Make the menu in the doc header sticky
Save before exporting in edit mode

property.content: {{velocity}} #macro (__icon $name){{html clean="false"}} {{/html}}#end ## #if ($doc.getObject('PhenoTips.PatientClass')) $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu')## (% id="patient-record-actions" class="content-actions page-actions" %)((( (% id="pr-more-actions-menu" class="menu menu-horizontal" %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') #if($hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) * [[#__icon("pencil")$services.localization.render('core.menu.edit')>>path:$doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams)|| id="prActionEdit"]] #end## HAS EDIT #else## NOT IN VIEW MODE, SHOW EDIT MODE ACTIONS * (% class="xDropdown" %){{html clean="false"}} {{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} * {{html clean="false"}} {{/html}} #end## DONE WITH EDIT MODE SPECIFIC ACTIONS #set ($canDelete = !$doc.isNew() && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('delete')) #if ($canDelete) * [[#__icon("times")$services.localization.render('core.menu.delete')>>path:$doc.getURL('delete', $!languageparams)|| id="prActionDelete"]] #end## HAS DELETE * (% class="xDropdown" %){{html clean="false"}} $services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.jumpMenu'){{/html}} ##The ToC will be populated by JS ** ---- * (% class="xDropdown" %)#__icon("cog") $services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu') #if ($xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'content') ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.viewMode')>>$doc.fullName|| title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.viewMode.title')" target="_blank"]] #end #if ($isAdvancedUser && $xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'history') ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.history')>>path:$doc.getURL('view', 'viewer=history')|| target="_blank" title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.history.title')"]] #end #if ($xwiki.getDocument($xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')).getObject('XWiki.PDFClass')) #set ($pdfTemplate = $xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')) #else #set ($pdfTemplate = 'PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode') #end #if ($isAdvancedUser && $hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.JSONImportDialog')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.JSONImportDialog')## ** (% class="empty" %)---- ** (% class="json-import single-patient-import" %){{html clean="false"}}$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.importJSON'){{/html}} #end ** (% class="empty" %)---- ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportPDF')>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=pdf&pdfcover=0&pdftoc=0&pdftemplate=${pdfTemplate}")|| class="export-link"]] #if($isAdvancedUser) #if ($hasAdmin) ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportXAR')>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=xar&name=${doc.fullName}&pages=${doc.fullName}")|| class="export-link"]] #end ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportJSON')>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.ExportPatient', 'get', "id=${escapetool.url($doc.documentReference.name)}&outputSyntax=plain")|| class="export-link"]] #end## isAdvancedUser #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) #set ($extensionContent = $services.rendering.render($e.execute(), 'xhtml/1.0')) #if ($stringtool.isNotBlank($extensionContent)) #if (!$foreach.hasContent) ** ---- #set ($foreach.hasContent = true) #end ** {{html clean=false}}$extensionContent{{/html}} #end #end )))## menu )))## container #elseif ($doc.name == 'AllData' && $xcontext.action == 'view') $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu')## (% id="patient-directory-actions" class="content-actions directory-actions" %)((( (% id="pd-more-actions-menu" class="menu menu-horizontal" %)((( #if($hasCreatePage) $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.JSONImportDialog')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.JSONImportDialog')## * {{html}}{{/html}}(% class="hidden" %)((({{include reference="PhenoTips.CreatePatientRecordForm" /}}))) * #__icon("upload") {{html}}{{/html}} #end * (% class="xDropdown" %)#__icon("download") $services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.export') ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.export.excel')>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.Export', 'get', "space=${escapetool.url($doc.space)}&outputSyntax=plain")|| id="phenotips_export" class="phenotips_export_tool" title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.export.excel.tooltip')"]] ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.export.json')>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.ExportJSON', 'get', "space=${escapetool.url($doc.space)}&outputSyntax=plain")|| id="phenotips_json_export" class="phenotips_export_tool" title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.export.json.tooltip')"]] #set ($service = $services.pushPatient)## #set ($configuredServers = $service.getPushTargetsWithHistory(""))## #if ($configuredServers.size() > 0) #if ($configuredServers.size() == 1) #set ($indent = "* #__icon('share')") #else #set ($indent = '**') * (% class="xDropdown" %)#__icon("share") $services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.push.toAnotherDB') #end #foreach ($mapEntry in $configuredServers.entrySet())## #set ($serverName = $mapEntry.key.getServerID())## ${indent} {{html wiki=false clean=false}}$services.localization.render('phenotips.allData.menu.push', [$serverName]){{/html}} #end## #end## ))) ))) #end{{/velocity}}
